english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0343/2007 ) by Chris Davies, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the Community strategy to reduce CO 2 emissions from passenger cars and light commercial vehicles ( 2007/2119(INI) ).
